trans-unit.source: Defines a configuration section for a cache based on the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Caching.MemoryCache" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 为基于 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Caching.MemoryCache" /> 类的缓存定义配置节。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.Configuration.MemoryCacheSection> class defines the settings that are available in the `memoryCache` section of a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.Configuration.MemoryCacheSection>类定义中可用的设置`memoryCache`配置文件节。

trans-unit.source: In this section, the `namedCaches` element is used to configure a default instance of the cache and to configure any additional named instances.
trans-unit.target: 在本部分中，`namedCaches`元素用于配置缓存的默认实例和配置任何其他命名的实例。
有关详细信息，请参阅[ <memoryCache>元素 （缓存设置）](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/memorycache-element-cache-settings.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Caching.Configuration.MemoryCacheSection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Caching.Configuration.MemoryCacheSection" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of configuration settings for the named <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Caching.MemoryCache" /> instances.
trans-unit.target: 获取命名的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Caching.MemoryCache" /> 实例的配置设置的集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of settings for each named cache.
trans-unit.target: 每个命名缓存的设置的集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.Configuration.MemoryCacheSection.NamedCaches%2A> property references the collection of configuration settings from one or more `namedCaches` elements of the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.Configuration.MemoryCacheSection.NamedCaches%2A>属性引用的配置设置的集合从一个或多个`namedCaches`配置文件的元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information about configuration options that are related to this property, see [<namedCaches> Element (Cache Settings)](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/namedcaches-element-cache-settings.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关此属性与相关的配置选项的详细信息，请参阅[ <namedCaches>元素 （缓存设置）](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/namedcaches-element-cache-settings.md)。
